title: An Unexpected Gift From YouTube
description: Thanks for watching guys, appreciate your comments (   )  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
transcript: What's up guys Lew here back with another video And today, well today I have no idea what's in front of me Every so often a package arrives here A complete surprise I know it came from YouTube And I know on the front it says 'Because You Created So Much For The World How sentimental Gets me right here, right in the heart Is the heart on So let's do the dance A secret surprise from the good people over at YouTube What? Comments Whoa This is the quietest I've been (laughs) This is mysterious 30 pieces of original art inspired by real fan comments Throughout this book you will find real fan comments, brought to life through the eyes of 6 different artists from around the world So the comment is over here, the interpretation is over here via the artist It takes a lot of balls to be who you are and live your life out in the open and share it with everyone I am so glad to see how far you have come Big big thanks for making my days happier and thoughts funnier That's really cool The comment section can be a place, ummm It can be a kind of hostile place at times but this here is an example of how it can also There can be some meaning down there How about that comment " You make me want to try and live my life" Wow This is cool art here The gadgets and whatnot You are still the same person you were at the beginning Don't go watch those early videos people Save yourself That's cool art right there too Wow Thank you! YouTube Another cool, commemorative, thing just about the space in general It's a cool community to be a part of and a lot of that, most of it, if not all of it, has to do with you guys Who watch and in this case comment Yeah If there is some kind of enjoyment that you get out of this Meaning Inspiration I'm happy about that because I certainly do Get somethin' back So Keep commenting Dad Dad: Yeah What's goin' on Dad say hi to everybody on Unbox Therapy Oh, hi (laughing)
transcript_entity_values: Because You Created So Much For The World How sentimental Gets
